history.proof: intros P HPres HAtLeast. unfold at_least in HAtLeast. unfold Lindenbaum_ensures. intros CA init HPInit. apply HAtLeast. sfirstorder depth: 3.

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
minL: MinimumLanguage L
pL: PropositionalLanguage L
GammaP: Provable L
GammaD: Derivable L
SC: NormalSequentCalculus L GammaP GammaD
bSC: BasicSequentCalculus L GammaD
fwSC: FiniteWitnessedSequentCalculus L GammaD
minSC: MinimumSequentCalculus L GammaD
ipSC: IntuitionisticPropositionalSequentCalculus L GammaD
minAX: MinimumAxiomatization L GammaP
ipAX: IntuitionisticPropositionalLogic L GammaP

Goal:
forall P : Ensemble expr -> Prop, Lindenbaum_preserves P -> at_least consistent P -> Lindenbaum_ensures P consistent

Premises:
FiniteWitnessedSequentCalculus : forall L : Language, Derivable L -> Prop
IntuitionisticPropositionalSequentCalculus : forall L : Language, PropositionalLanguage L -> Derivable L -> Prop
Ensemble = fun U : Type => U -> Prop : Type -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
at_least = fun (L : Language) (P cP : context -> Prop) => forall Phi : context, cP Phi -> P Phi : forall L : Language, (context -> Prop) -> (context -> Prop) -> Prop Argument L is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope function_scope]
Lindenbaum_ensures = fun (A : Type) (P cP : Ensemble A -> Prop) => forall (CA : Countable A) (init : Ensemble A), P init -> cP (LindenbaumConstruction CA init P) : forall A : Type, (Ensemble A -> Prop) -> (Ensemble A -> Prop) -> Prop Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope]
Record MinimumLanguage (L : Language) : Type := Build_MinimumLanguage { impp : expr -> expr -> expr } For Build_MinimumLanguage: Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
Record Derivable (L : Language) : Type := Build_Derivable { derivable : context -> expr -> Prop } For Build_Derivable: Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
IntuitionisticPropositionalLogic : forall (L : Language) (minL : MinimumLanguage L), PropositionalLanguage L -> forall Gamma : Provable L, MinimumAxiomatization L Gamma -> Prop
BasicSequentCalculus : forall L : Language, Derivable L -> Prop
Lindenbaum_preserves = fun (A : Type) (P : Ensemble A -> Prop) => forall (CA : Countable A) (init : Ensemble A), P init -> P (LindenbaumConstruction CA init P) : forall A : Type, (Ensemble A -> Prop) -> Prop Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope]
NormalSequentCalculus : forall L : Language, Provable L -> Derivable L -> Prop
expr = fun Language0 : Language => let (expr) := Language0 in expr : Language -> Type Argument Language is implicit and maximally inserted
MinimumAxiomatization : forall L : Language, MinimumLanguage L -> Provable L -> Prop
Record Provable (L : Language) : Type := Build_Provable { provable : expr -> Prop } For Build_Provable: Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
consistent = fun (L : Language) (Gamma : Derivable L) (Phi : context) => exists x : expr, ~ Phi |-- x : forall L : Language, Derivable L -> context -> Prop Arguments L, Gamma are implicit and maximally inserted
MinimumSequentCalculus : forall L : Language, MinimumLanguage L -> Derivable L -> Prop
Record PropositionalLanguage (L : Language) : Type := Build_PropositionalLanguage { andp : expr -> expr -> expr; orp : expr -> expr -> expr; falsep : expr } For Build_PropositionalLanguage: Argument scopes are [_ function_scope function_scope _]

```coq
intros P HPres HAtLeast.
unfold at_least in HAtLeast.
unfold Lindenbaum_ensures.
intros CA init HPInit.
apply HAtLeast.
apply Lindenbaum_preserves_by_finiteness; try assumption.
- apply not_finite_witnessed_finite_captured.
  apply fwSC.
- intros x Hx.
  apply Hx.
Qed.
```

original: intros P HPres HAtLeast. unfold at_least in HAtLeast. unfold Lindenbaum_ensures. intros CA init HPInit. apply HAtLeast. apply Lindenbaum_preserves_by_finiteness; try auto. - apply not_finite_witnessed_finite_captured. apply fwSC. - intros x Hx. apply Hx.
